data.title: The Cry Original 1963 Polish A1 Movie Poster
data.meta_description: Original 1963 Polish A1 poster by Bronislaw Zelek for the film The Cry (Krik) directed by Jaromil Jires with Eva Limanova / Josef Abrham / Eva Kopecka / Jiri Kvapil.
data.text:
